title: Looking for Gold+ Mid for serious 5man team
body:
Hello to all that are interested. We are looking to add to our four-man team in hopes of bringing together a solid five-man team. We are looking to give the competitive scene a serious shot, so we would love to add to our ranks. Definitely looking for someone who's on-board with some banter within the group as melding with the team is a serious need.

As far as requirements go we would love someone with a general understanding of the game and a desire to learn and grow with the rest of the team.
Our schedule however is restricted to about 10pm - 7am GMT +11.

If you wish to give this a shot with us, please feel free to add myself in-game. My IGN is: Mioh
Hope to hear from you soon!


**:EDIT:**
Thank you everyone for your lively responses! I received a lot of response and will definitely be trying my best to trial everyone when I get the chance. But for now, I will need to put a hold on any further requests. Thank you all for your interest!

replies.body: MY IGN is THEKING361, I would like to join your team if possible :)
Just added you mate, hope you are still looking

hey man I just added you so yeahh didn't say if you needed chat but 5 mans I'm guessing you would 

cheers
